prompts: Create a futuristic Pokemon resembling a spaceship with metallic fins and green accents.
I want a steel-type Pokemon that looks like a robotic creature with sharp edges.
Generate a Pokemon with a sleek design and large wings that glows in the dark.
Make a Pokemon that combines alien features with a crystalline body and vibrant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a unique blend of technology and nature with a shimmering surface.
Design a Pokemon that embodies both elegance and strength with a majestic silhouette.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a celestial being, equipped with long, pointed limbs and a shiny exterior.
